column5: The Blue Barn is located in the rural LaRue-New York area of East Texas. We are just down the road from NY TX Zipline Adventures & not far from Canton's First Monday! You'll love the beautiful scenery, rustic charm, full kitchen, & spacious bathroom.  **DISCOUNT SPECIAL** We are currently offering a special $10 DISCOUNT for guests who agree to have NO FOOD items provided! Just send a message and mention the $10 OFF SPECIAL. I will send you a special offer showing the discounted rate!**
column8: The Blue Barn at Myrtle Springs Mt.
